Sentencas: A 1-D electrochemical model for a solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) is developed and validated using published experimental data.
Titulo: Experimental and Analytical Study of an Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell

Sentencas: The model combines thermodynamics, kinetic, ohmic, and concentration overpotentials to predict cell performance.
Titulo: Experimental and Analytical Study of an Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell

Sentencas: For the anode-supported SOEC, good agreement is obtained between the model and experimental data, with ohmic loss being the major contributor to the cell's total overpotential.
Titulo: Experimental and Analytical Study of an Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell

Sentencas: Both kinetic and concentration losses are less significant due to high-temperature operation.
Titulo: Experimental and Analytical Study of an Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell

Sentencas: Due to the dominating performance loss, reducing the anode thickness is effective in diminishing the cell potential.
Titulo: Experimental and Analytical Study of an Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell

Sentencas: Overall, this simple 1-D model can be employed as a design tool to evaluate component design and estimate system performance for industrial applications.
Titulo: Experimental and Analytical Study of an Anode-Supported Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell
